settings.title: HTTP App settings
settings.intro: Triggering flows with HTTP GET requests can be done by calling http://[YourHomeyIP]/api/app/com.internet/[event]/[value]. For remote access this can be done by calling https://[YourId].homey.athom.com/api/app/com.internet/[event]. Both methods require authorization by default. This can be disabled for *both* methods by unselect the authorization checkbox. Restart this app (on the app-overview) after you have changed settings.

messages.errorSaving: Oops... Something went wrong saving your settings
messages.successSaving: Settings saved successfully. Changed settings will be active after a restart of this app.
